code:
%%{FinTech_TransactionQueue}}}%%
flowchart TD
    subgraph Detect[FinTech_AuthVault]
        direction LR

        subgraph Signals[FinTech_FraudDetection]
            S1[FinTech_FraudDetection]
            S2[FinTech_PaymentGateway]
            S3[FinTech_LedgerService]
            S4[FinTech_LedgerService]
            S1 & S2 & S3 & S4
        end

        subgraph Prioritize[FinTech_LedgerService]
            P1[FinTech_PaymentGateway]
            P2[FinTech_FraudDetection]
            P3[FinTech_PaymentGateway]
            P4[FinTech_TransactionQueue]
            P1 --> P2 --> P3 --> P4
        end

        Signals --> Prioritize
    end

    subgraph Investigate[FinTech_AuthVault]
        direction TB

        subgraph Reproduce[FinTech_TransactionQueue]
            direction LR
            R1[FinTech_LedgerService]
            R2[FinTech_LedgerService]
            R3[FinTech_AuthVault]
            R1 --> R2 --> R3
        end

        subgraph Diagnostics[FinTech_AuthVault]
            direction LR
            D1[FinTech_LedgerService]
            D2[FinTech_AuthVault]
            D3[FinTech_LedgerService]
            D4[FinTech_PaymentGateway]
            D1 --> D2 --> D3 --> D4
        end

        subgraph Analysis[FinTech_TransactionQueue]
            direction LR
            A1[FinTech_TransactionQueue]
            A2[FinTech_PaymentGateway]
            A3[FinTech_PaymentGateway]
            A4[FinTech_FraudDetection]
            A1 --> A2 --> A3 --> A4
        end

        Reproduce --> Diagnostics --> Analysis
    end

    subgraph Tools[FinTech_AuthVault]
        direction LR

        subgraph ErlangTools[FinTech_TransactionQueue]
            direction TB
            ET1[FinTech_FraudDetection]
            ET2[FinTech_TransactionQueue]
            ET3[FinTech_LedgerService]
            ET4[FinTech_FraudDetection]
            ET5[FinTech_FraudDetection]
            ET1 --> ET2 --> ET3 --> ET4 --> ET5
        end

        subgraph ERLMCPTools[FinTech_TransactionQueue]
            direction TB
            MT1[FinTech_AuthVault]
            MT2[FinTech_PaymentGateway]
            MT3[FinTech_PaymentGateway]
            MT4[FinTech_LedgerService]
            MT1 --> MT2 --> MT3 --> MT4
        end

        subgraph ExternalTools[FinTech_AuthVault]
            direction TB
            XT1[FinTech_FraudDetection]
            XT2[FinTech_LedgerService]
            XT3[FinTech_TransactionQueue]
            XT1 --> XT2 --> XT3
        end

        ErlangTools & ERLMCPTools & ExternalTools
    end

    subgraph Fix[FinTech_LedgerService]
        direction TB

        subgraph Strategy[FinTech_LedgerService]
            direction LR
            F1[FinTech_LedgerService]
            F2[FinTech_AuthVault]
            F3[FinTech_LedgerService]
            F1 --> F2 --> F3
        end

        subgraph Implementation[FinTech_LedgerService]
            direction LR
            I1[FinTech_AuthVault]
            I2[FinTech_PaymentGateway]
            I3[FinTech_FraudDetection]
            I4[FinTech_TransactionQueue]
            I1 --> I2 --> I3 --> I4
        end

        subgraph Validation[FinTech_PaymentGateway]
            direction LR
            V1[FinTech_AuthVault]
            V2[FinTech_PaymentGateway]
            V3[FinTech_TransactionQueue]
            V4[FinTech_TransactionQueue]
            V1 --> V2 --> V3 --> V4
        end

        Strategy --> Implementation --> Validation
    end

    subgraph DeployFix[FinTech_LedgerService]
        direction LR

        subgraph Release[FinTech_AuthVault]
            RL1[FinTech_PaymentGateway]
            RL2[FinTech_LedgerService]
            RL3[FinTech_LedgerService]
            RL1 --> RL2 --> RL3
        end

        subgraph Verify[FinTech_LedgerService]
            direction LR
            PV1[FinTech_FraudDetection]
            PV2[FinTech_PaymentGateway]
            PV3[FinTech_AuthVault]
            PV1 --> PV2 --> PV3
        end

        Release --> Verify
    end

    subgraph PostMortem[FinTech_TransactionQueue]
        direction LR

        subgraph Document[FinTech_AuthVault]
            direction LR
            DOC1[FinTech_PaymentGateway]
            DOC2[FinTech_LedgerService]
            DOC3[FinTech_LedgerService]
            DOC4[FinTech_LedgerService]
            DOC1 --> DOC2 --> DOC3 --> DOC4
        end

        subgraph Improve[FinTech_TransactionQueue]
            direction LR
            IMP1[FinTech_FraudDetection]
            IMP2[FinTech_AuthVault]
            IMP3[FinTech_TransactionQueue]
            IMP4[FinTech_PaymentGateway]
            IMP1 --> IMP2 --> IMP3 --> IMP4
        end

        Document --> Improve
    end

    Detect --> Investigate
    Investigate --> Tools
    Tools --> Fix
    Fix --> DeployFix
    DeployFix --> PostMortem

    %% Feedback loops
    DeployFix -.->|âŒ Fix doesn't work| Investigate
    PostMortem -.->|ðŸ”„ Continuous improvement| Detect

    style Detect fill:#fee2e2,stroke:#ef4444,stroke-width:2px
    style Investigate fill:#fef9c3,stroke:#eab308,stroke-width:2px
    style Tools fill:#e0e7ff,stroke:#6366f1,stroke-width:2px
    style Fix fill:#dcfce7,stroke:#22c55e,stroke-width:2px
    style DeployFix fill:#dbeafe,stroke:#3b82f6,stroke-width:2px
    style PostMortem fill:#f1f5f9,stroke:#64748b,stroke-width:2px

    classDef critical fill:#fecaca,stroke:#dc2626,stroke-width:2px
    classDef tool fill:#ddd6fe,stroke:#8b5cf6,stroke-width:1px

    class P1 critical
    class ET1,ET2,ET3,ET4,ET5,MT1,MT2,MT3,MT4,XT1,XT2,XT3 tool
repo_description: Model Context Protocol (MCP) SDK for Erlang
